name: Carton Carrier
description:
The desert rat gang has stolen your infinite catnip generator blueprints!

As the leader of the cat engineers, you’ll have to pilot the carton land mothership on the endless sea of sand to recover the blueprints!

EVERY TEN SECONDS making unmanned vehicles to defend against the rats’ attacks, chase down the rat’s lair fortress and defeat them to retrieve the blueprints!

Attention! You only have 10 seconds to build your unmanned vehicle！

Tip: Components with red and blue wires wrapped around them can power unmanned vehicles
